fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request

Class NominatimReverseRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request.NominatimRequest
      • fr.dudie.nominatim.client.request.NominatimReverseRequest

  • public class NominatimReverseRequest
extends NominatimRequest
    Holds request parameters for a reverse geocoding request.

    Attributes documentation was extracted from Nominatim Wiki page on October 26th, 2013.

    Author:
    Jeremie Huchet
